text: Angus Macfadyen (born 21 September 1963)Biodata is a Scottish actor. His roles include Robert the Bruce, both in Braveheart and Robert the Bruce, Jeff Denlon in the Saw franchise, McCreedy in Cameron Crowe's We Bought a Zoo, and biologist James Murray in The Lost City of Z. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish movie actors Category:Scottish television actors Category:Scottish stage actors Category:Scottish voice actors Category:Actors from Edinburgh
title: Angus Macfadyen
